attributes.action: Stop using the UK as a test lab to tackle the Coronavirus crisis.
attributes.additional_details: For the Government to work with world Governments and take further action to prevent person to person Coronavirus infection and not to isolate itself from them.
attributes.background: No other Country in the world has  undertaken a ‘herd immunity’ policy. Such scientific advice is questionable and could lead to a delay in stopping the spread of the disease before a vaccine is found. UK citizens should not become lab rats in such medical trials.

rejection.details:
You might want to know that the Government has set out that 'herd immunity' is not a strategy. You can read a recent comment by the Health Secretary here:

https://hansard.parliament.uk/Commons/2020-03-16/debates/235689EC-0A18-4488-BFCF-9F012A1A0C1B/Covid-19#contribution-4215E975-1483-4CB0-A03B-1F67E4E9B990
